TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ScrollBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control
Public MustInherit Class ScrollBar Inherits Control
public ref class ScrollBar abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 实现滚动条控件的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality of a scroll bar control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会直接从 类继承。You typically do not inherit directly from the class. 若要创建自己的滚动条类，请从 或 类继承。To create your own scroll bar class, inherit from the or class. > [!NOTE] > 滚动框有时称为滚动块。The scroll box is sometimes referred to as the scroll thumb. 若要调整滚动条控件的值范围，请设置 和 属性。To adjust the value range of the scroll bar control, set the and properties. 若要调整滚动框移动的距离，请设置 和 属性。To adjust the distance the scroll box moves, set the and properties. 若要调整滚动框的起始点，请 在控件最初显示时设置属性。To adjust the starting point of the scroll box, set the property when the control is initially displayed. 用户界面准则表明， 和 属性的设置相对于用户看到的视图大小，而不是相对于包括不可见部分的总大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果具有显示大图像的滚动条的图片框，则 和 属性的设置应相对于图片框的大小，而不是相对于图像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并初始化一个 ，并将其添加到 中。The following example creates and initializes a and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic VScrollBar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic VScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个帮助器方法，该方法由 方法用来返回控件应缩放的边界。This is a helper method that used by the method to return the bounds that the control should be scaled by. 如果要重用缩放逻辑，则可以重写此方法 ，但需要提供自己的边界。You may override this method if you wish to reuse scaling logic, but you need to supply your own bounds.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，当滚动框长距离移动时向 属性加上该值或从中减去该值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击滚动框两侧的滚动条轨道时， 属性将根据属性中设置的值进行更改 。When the user clicks in the scroll bar track on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. > [!NOTE] > 您可以处理键按下事件，以便在用户按下 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 键时，滚动框将移动。You can handle key press events so that when the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key the scroll box moves. 用户界面准则表明， 和 属性的设置相对于用户看到的视图大小，而不是相对于包括不可见部分的总大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果具有显示大图像的滚动条的图片框，则 和 属性的设置应相对于图片框的大小，而不是相对于图像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下面的示例假定你已创建 ，并将添加 到 ，并向添加了水平 和垂直 。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 此代码示例是为类概述提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此示例中， 属性是相对于的大小设置的 。In this example, the property is set relative to the size of the . 若要运行此示例，必须添加对 和 命名空间的引用。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅 [如何：使用 Visual Studio 编译和运行完整的 Windows 窗体代码示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取或设置可滚动范围的上限值。

span.span: Gets or sets the upper limit of values of the scrollable range.
A numeric value.
The default value is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以考虑 动态调整属性，使滚动条父级的大小与像素大小成正比，或与显示的行或行数成正比。You might consider adjusting the property dynamically to match the size of the scroll bar's parent in proportion to pixel size or to the number of rows or lines displayed. 只能以编程方式访问最大值。The maximum value can only be reached programmatically. 滚动条的值在运行时无法通过用户交互达到其最大值。The value of a scroll bar cannot reach its maximum value through user interaction at run time. 可以通过用户交互达到的最大值等于1加上 属性值减去 属性值。The maximum value that can be reached through user interaction is equal to 1 plus the property value minus the property value. 如有必要，可以将 属性设置为对象的大小-1，以将其设置为1。If necessary, you can set the property to the size of the object -1 to account for the term of 1. ## Examples 下面的示例假定你已创建 ，并将添加 到 ，并向添加了水平 和垂直 。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 此代码示例是为类概述提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此示例中， 如果显示滚动条的大小加上属性大小的调整因子，则将属性设置为它的大小 。In this example, the property is set to the size of the plus the size of the scrollbar if it is visible plus an adjustment factor of the size of the property. 若要运行此示例，必须添加对 和 命名空间的引用。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅 [如何：使用 Visual Studio 编译和运行完整的 Windows 窗体代码示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

span.span: A

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦点时，控件将鼠标滚轮移动转换为滚动 。The control will convert mouse wheel movements to scrolling when the is in focus. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses the derived class . 创建和事件的事件处理程序 。Event handlers for the and events are created. 此代码假定 已在窗体上创建了和，并且该按钮具有事件的事件处理程序 。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 单击该按钮时， 滚动条的属性将以代码进行调整。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 标签将显示属性的当前值 和更改它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 你会注意到，当按钮的事件更改滚动值时 ，只 会引发事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 相反，当手动滚动滚动条时，事件将在 事件之后立即引发 。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overridable Sub OnValueChanged (e As EventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 以下示例滚动图片框中的图像。The following example scrolls an image in a picture box. 当用户滚动时，它将使用滚动条的来重绘图像的新部分。It uses the of the scrollbar to redraw a new part of the image whenever the user scrolls. 此代码示例是为类概述提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅 [如何：使用 Visual Studio 编译和运行完整的 Windows 窗体代码示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses the derived class . 创建和事件的事件处理程序 。Event handlers for the and events are created. 此代码假定 已在窗体上创建了和，并且该按钮具有事件的事件处理程序 。This code assumes that a and have been created on a form and that the button has an event handler for the event. 单击该按钮时， 滚动条的属性将以代码进行调整。When the button is clicked, the property of the scroll bar is adjusted in code. 标签将显示属性的当前值 和更改它的事件。The label will display the current value of the property and the event that changed it. 你会注意到，当按钮的事件更改滚动值时 ，只 会引发事件。You will notice that when the scroll value is changed by the button's event, only the event is raised. 相反，当手动滚动滚动条时，事件将在 事件之后立即引发 。In contrast, when the scroll bar is scrolled manually, the event is raised immediately after the event. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar.OnScroll Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置小距离移动滚动框时，在 属性中加上或减去的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按下某个箭头键或单击某个滚动条按钮时， 属性将根据属性中设置的值进行更改 。When the user presses one of the arrow keys or clicks one of the scroll bar buttons, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 用户界面准则表明， 和 属性的设置相对于用户看到的视图大小，而不是相对于包括不可见部分的总大小。User interface guidelines suggest that the and properties are set relative to the size of the view that the user sees, not to the total size including the unseen part. 例如，如果具有显示大图像的滚动条的图片框，则 和 属性的设置应相对于图片框的大小，而不是相对于图像的大小。For example, if you have a picture box with scroll bars displaying a large image, the and properties should be set relative to the size of the picture box, not to the size of the image. ## Examples 下面的示例假定你已创建 ，并将添加 到 ，并向添加了水平 和垂直 。The following example assumes that you have created a , added a to the , and added a horizontal and a vertical to the . 此代码示例是为类概述提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview. 在此示例中， 属性是相对于的大小设置的 。In this example, the property is set relative to the size of the . 若要运行此示例，必须添加对 和 命名空间的引用。You must add references to the and namespaces to run this example. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何在 Visual Studio 中运行此示例的说明，请参阅 [如何：使用 Visual Studio 编译和运行完整的 Windows 窗体代码示例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100))。For instructions about how to run this example in Visual Studio, see [How to: Compile and Run a Complete Windows Forms Code Example Using Visual Studio](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc447f7e-4c3b-4397-9d05-aeba3ca49416(v=vs.100)). [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollBar Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollBar Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户能否使用 Tab 键将焦点放到 控件上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key.

value.span: 如果用户可以用 Tab 键将焦点放到该控件上，则为 ；否则为 false。

span.span: if the user can give the focus to the control by using the TAB key; otherwise, false.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按 TAB 键时，输入焦点设置为 TAB 键顺序中的下一个控件。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 属性值为的控件 `false` 不包括在 tab 键顺序中的控件集合中。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 您可以通过设置控件的属性值来操作 tab 键顺序 。You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's property value.
